ing: 1 (8.75 ounce) jar Dickinson'sÂ® Sweet 'n' Hot Pepper & Onion Relish
1 teaspoon Dickinson'sÂ® Lime Curd, or to taste
des: "Fresh pineapple salsa with sweet and hot relish and a hint of lime makes a perfect accompaniment to grilled meat or fish or as a snack with chips."
ins: Mix together all ingredients in small serving bowl. Chill 1 to 2 hours. Serve with tortilla chips or as a side for grilled meat or fish.
